attributes.additional_details: The hostel in Pontypool by cadet hall is a disgrace since opening nothing but trouble has dawned on our doorsteps..People have been forced to move homes, and after the latest incident ( Someone being brutally killed by members of the Hostel)  People are afraid to leave there homes. Please help and show your support then maybe just maybe we can get the Hostel shut down and maybe start to feel a little safe.
